posts.author: John Doe
posts.title: What is HTML?
posts.content: I have doubts about what HTML is. Can someone help me? Thanks! :)

answers.author: Jane Doe
answers.content: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language. It is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser. It can be assisted by technologies such as Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) and scripting languages such as JavaScript.

posts.author: John Doe
posts.title: What is CSS?
posts.content: I have doubts about what CSS is. Can someone help me? Thanks! :)

answers.author: John Doe
answers.content: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets. It is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in a markup language such as HTML.

posts.author: John Doe
posts.title: What is JavaScript?
posts.content: I have doubts about what JavaScript is. Can someone help me? Thanks! :)

answers.author: Jane Doe
answers.content: JavaScript is a high-level, interpreted programming language that conforms to the ECMAScript specification. It is a language that is also characterized as dynamic, weakly typed, prototype-based and multi-paradigm.

posts.author: Jane Doe
posts.title: What is React?
posts.content: I have doubts about what React is. Can someone help me? Thanks! :)

answers.author: John Doe
answers.content: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It is maintained by Facebook and a community of individual developers and companies.

posts.author: Jane Doe
posts.title: What is Node.js?
posts.content: I have doubts about what Node.js is. Can someone help me? Thanks! :)

answers.author: Jane Doe
answers.content: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, JavaScript runtime environment that executes JavaScript code outside of a browser.

posts.author: Jane Doe
posts.title: What is Express?
posts.content: I have doubts about what Express is. Can someone help me? Thanks! :)

answers.author: John Doe
answers.content: Express is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features for web and mobile applications.
